# Welcome

Welcome to Drzzle's support wiki. Here you should find answers to some of the most commonly asked questions. If there is something that you can't find under this wiki then please contact our support at support@drzzle.com.

Additionally, if you own a github account you also have the option of opening an issue or question under our wiki repository. You may come across questions there that others may have asked that aren't listed here. We'd love to hear from you!
